inclusion.criterion: Patient will be asked to fill out the STAI questionnaire prior to placement of the labor epidural catheter
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will complete the pre procedure questionnaire
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will be asked to fill out the STAI questionnaire again after completion of the neuraxial procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will record her perception of pain during the placement of the labor epidural catheter using a VAS (Visual Analogue Scale)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient is receiving neuraxial anesthesia for a cesarean delivery
exclusion.label: triggers
